speaker: mon_sevenoclock_active
sound: "You should be sleeping by now!"

speaker: mon_sevenoclock_active
sound: "You should be sleeping by now."

speaker: mon_sevenoclock_active
sound: "I'm going to eat you!"

speaker: mon_sevenoclock_active
sound: "SLEEP!"

speaker: mon_sevenoclock_active
sound: "Jump in my bag, it will be less painful that way."

speaker: mon_sevenoclock_active
sound: "Another one awake past its bedtime."

speaker: mon_sevenoclock_active
sound: "Those who do not sleep won't ever wake up."

speaker: mon_sevenoclock_active
sound: "I'm going to beat you until you sleep, one way or another."

speaker: mon_sevenoclock_active
sound: "This time is for the sleeping, not for the wakeful."

speaker: mon_sevenoclock_active
sound: "There is no excuse.  You sleep, or you die."

speaker: mon_sevenoclock_active
sound: "I am here to guard the sleepers."

speaker: mon_sevenoclock_active
sound: "I am here to kill the awake."

speaker: mon_sevenoclock_active
sound: "I won't let you wake them up."

speaker: mon_sevenoclock_active
sound: "They say being dead is akin to being asleep.  Sleep now, or you'll know what is it to be dead."

speaker: mon_sevenoclock_active
sound: "So hungry."

speaker: mon_sevenoclock_active
sound: "Need to eat."

speaker: mon_sevenoclock_active
sound: "Their flesh and dreams are rotten."

speaker: mon_sevenoclock_active
sound: "You will be fine food."

speaker: mon_sevenoclock_active
sound: "The wakeful threaten the sleepers.  I cannot let that be."

speaker: mon_sevenoclock_active
sound: "It is currently the sleepers' time."

speaker: mon_sevenoclock_active
sound: "All who are awake during the sleepers' time are mine."

speaker: mon_sevenoclock_active
sound: "I wish for all to sleep well in this time."

speaker: mon_sevenoclock_active
sound: "You are still able to sleep.  Why do you squander this gift?"

speaker: mon_sevenoclock_active
sound: "I will ensure that all who sleep won't be disturbed."

speaker: mon_sevenoclock_active
sound: "I will ensure that all who cannot sleep will die."

speaker: mon_sevenoclock_active
sound: "For the last time: SLEEP!"
